name: analyze_war_map_tool
description: Specialized tool for analyzing historical war and battle maps with expert cartographic interpretation. Extracts military movements, troop positions, battle lines, fortifications, terrain features, strategic annotations, directional arrows, unit symbols, and tactical information. Interprets topographical elements, elevation indicators, defensive positions, supply routes, and temporal progression of military operations. NOT for: modern road maps, tourist maps, or non-military cartographic content.

image_path.description: S3 URL (s3://bucket/key) or absolute file path to the image. Use this OR image_data, not both.

image_data.description: Base64-encoded image data. Use this OR image_path, not both. Preferred when image is already in memory.

aws_profile.description: Optional AWS profile name for Bedrock authentication. If not provided, uses default AWS credentials

result.description: Analysis result from War Map Analyzer
